data.title: northernprovince
data.text:
Date Incidents April - 24&nbsp

Five civilians were killed in separate incidents, reports Tamil Net. Two youths were allegedly killed by the troops in the Batticaloa district. In a separate incident, unidentified assailants shot dead a civilian, identified as Pushpakumara, in the Seruvila area of Muttur district. Further, an Eelam Read more...

Five civilians were killed in separate incidents, reports Tamil Net. Two youths were allegedly killed by the troops in the Batticaloa district. In a separate incident, unidentified assailants shot dead a civilian, identified as Pushpakumara, in the Seruvila area of Muttur district. Further, an Eelam Peoples Democratic Party sympathizer, Nagamuttu Tharmarajah, was shot dead by unidentified assailants in the Kayts area of Jaffna district. Another civilian, Kanagaratnam Lingeswaran, was shot dead by unidentified assailants in the Valaichenai area of Batticaloa district. Read less...

May - 26&nbsp

A civilian was shot at and injured by LTTE cadres in the Anuradhapura area of Trincomalee district. On May 26, unidentified gunmen shot at and wounded a former Eelam People’s Democratic Party member in the Kayts area of Jaffna district. Read more...

A civilian was shot at and injured by LTTE cadres in the Anuradhapura area of Trincomalee district. On May 26, unidentified gunmen shot at and wounded a former Eelam People’s Democratic Party member in the Kayts area of Jaffna district. Read less...

May - 29&nbsp

Three more civilians were killed in separate incidents, according to the pro-LTTE website Tamil Net. Unidentified assailants shot dead a civilian, Subramaniam Thevaraj, in the Palaly area of Jaffna district on May 29. Elsewhere, a member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, identified as Michael Read more...

Three more civilians were killed in separate incidents, according to the pro-LTTE website Tamil Net. Unidentified assailants shot dead a civilian, Subramaniam Thevaraj, in the Palaly area of Jaffna district on May 29. Elsewhere, a member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, identified as Michael Jesudasan, was shot dead in front of St. Nicholas Church in Jaffna town. On the same day, Sri Lanka Army soldiers who allegedly penetrated 4-kilometers into the LTTE-controlled Vilathikulam area in the Vavuniya district exploded a claymore mine, killing a civilian, identified as Subramaniam Jeyarooban. Read less...

June - 5&nbsp

On June 5, a former member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party (EPDP), identified as Keshaman Anandan, and his female cousin, Rathnasingham Podini, were shot dead by ‘pistol gang’ cadres of the LTTE in the Kayts area of Jaffna district. Read more...

On June 5, a former member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party (EPDP), identified as Keshaman Anandan, and his female cousin, Rathnasingham Podini, were shot dead by ‘pistol gang’ cadres of the LTTE in the Kayts area of Jaffna district. Read less...

June - 13&nbsp

A Tamil political party member was shot at and injured by suspected LTTE cadres in the Nunavil area of Jaffna district. Read more...

A Tamil political party member was shot at and injured by suspected LTTE cadres in the Nunavil area of Jaffna district. Read less...

July - 3&nbsp

The Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) cadres shot dead a political activist of the Eelam People's Revolutionary Liberation Front (EPRLF), identified as Linton Ariyaratnam, in Jaffna on July 3-night. Read more...

The Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) cadres shot dead a political activist of the Eelam People's Revolutionary Liberation Front (EPRLF), identified as Linton Ariyaratnam, in Jaffna on July 3-night. Read less...

July - 23&nbsp

On July 23, a senior member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, Emily Janoos, was shot dead by unidentified assailants at Uoorkavatturai in the same district. Read more...

On July 23, a senior member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, Emily Janoos, was shot dead by unidentified assailants at Uoorkavatturai in the same district. Read less...

August - 9&nbspAugust - 10

Three civilians were killed in separate incidents, according to Tamil Net. A member of the Eelam Peoples' Democratic Party was shot dead by unidentified assailants in the Valaichchenai area of Batticaloa district on August 9. Elsewhere, another civilian, Sinnarasa Vasanthan, was shot dead by unident Read more...

Three civilians were killed in separate incidents, according to Tamil Net. A member of the Eelam Peoples' Democratic Party was shot dead by unidentified assailants in the Valaichchenai area of Batticaloa district on August 9. Elsewhere, another civilian, Sinnarasa Vasanthan, was shot dead by unidentified assailants in the Sandilipay area. On August 10, the body of a civilian, identified as Samithamby Mohanathas, with gun shot wounds was recovered from the Akkaraipattu area in Ampara district. Read less...

August - 20&nbsp

Suspected Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) gunmen shot dead former Tamil Parliamentarian, Sinnathamby Sivamaharajah, at his temporary residence in Tellippalai on August 20. He was a former Member of Parliament of the Tamil United Liberation Front (TULF) now headed by V. Anandasangaree, a lead Read more...

Suspected Liberation Tigers of Tamil Eelam (LTTE) gunmen shot dead former Tamil Parliamentarian, Sinnathamby Sivamaharajah, at his temporary residence in Tellippalai on August 20. He was a former Member of Parliament of the Tamil United Liberation Front (TULF) now headed by V. Anandasangaree, a leading critic of the LTTE. Read less...

September - 30&nbsp

Elsewhere, a former member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, Ponnaiya Srikaran, was shot dead by suspected LTTE cadres in the Point Pedro area. Read more...

Elsewhere, a former member of the Eelam People’s Democratic Party, Ponnaiya Srikaran, was shot dead by suspected LTTE cadres in the Point Pedro area. Read less...
